metadata.title: Barcoding of dual sgRNA cassettes for clonal tracking

annotations.description: we introduced a unique clone barcode (UCB; 1.4 Ã— 10^7 combinations) for each dual sgRNA cassette to label individual lentiviral integration events (Fig. 1a and Extended Data Fig. 4a,b). Using this strategy, we obtained an average of 2,770 bulk-extracted genomic DNA from organoid pools of four different...
